welcome_message_body: Welcome to Vernon, a charming city known for its scenic beauty and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the opportunity to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stewart Airport serves both domestic and international flights. It offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, shops, and a currency exchange.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Stewart Airport is dedicated to handling all international flights. It features customs and immigration services, as well as duty-free shopping.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the prompts to access the internet.
